name: Balloons Shoot
description:
Balloons Shoot is classical shoot game. The birds are flying and amongst the birds. Shoot the balloons and avoid killing the bird will cost life.

Features:
IceCube: will freeze all the birds and balloons.
Bomb: will clear all birds in sky.
Money Bag: will get more points.
Hare: will increase speed of balloons(try to avoid).
Tortoise: will decrease speed of balloons.
Heart: will increase life.
